meanings.definition: The extent to which something is covered or included.
meanings.sent1: The blanket provided good coverage on the bed.
meanings.sent2: The insurance plan offers comprehensive coverage for all medical expenses.
meanings.sent3: The picnic blanket had such great coverage that even the ants couldn't find a way in.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had wide coverage, reaching every corner of the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: The sunscreen lotion promised full coverage against harmful UV rays.

meanings.definition: The amount of protection provided by an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: The car insurance coverage includes both collision and liability protection.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to review your health insurance coverage before scheduling any medical procedures.
meanings.sent3: The insurance coverage was like a shield, guarding against unexpected financial burdens.
meanings.sent4: His umbrella insurance coverage was a safety net during uncertain times.
meanings.sent5: The flood insurance provided coverage for damages caused by water-related incidents.

meanings.definition: The reporting of news or events by the media.
meanings.sent1: The news coverage of the event was broadcasted live on television.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper's coverage of the political scandal was thorough and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The media coverage of the cat fashion show was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: The radio station's coverage of the weather was accurate and timely.
meanings.sent5: The online news portal provided extensive coverage of the sports event.

meanings.definition: The act of covering a particular area or subject.
meanings.sent1: The paint job had good coverage, with no spots left unpainted.
meanings.sent2: The textbook's coverage of the topic was clear and easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: The coverage of the cake with frosting was a messy but fun task.
meanings.sent4: Her speech had broad coverage, touching on various aspects of the issue.
meanings.sent5: The tent provided coverage from the rain during the camping trip.
